Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near 31st/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses temp. rerouted EB: 35th, Rhodes, 33rd, Cottage Grove, & 35th Term.; WB: Exit via 35th Term., due to street blockage near 31st/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 31st/Cottage Grove, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 35th, Rhodes, 33rd, Cottage Grove, & into 35th Terminal.

Westbound buses will operate/Exit via 35th Terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Clinton due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Clark/Lake due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

  • At this time, 63rd-bound Green Line, as well as Loop-bound Pink and Orange Lines are being rerouted through the outer Loop.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
